meanings.definition: A person displaying excessive or prejudiced loyalty or support for a particular group or cause.
meanings.sent1: The chauvinist always cheers loudly for his favorite team, no matter what.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a chauvinist for her unwavering dedication to the charity.
meanings.sent3: The chauvinist's loyalty to their favorite brand of soda was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: His chauvinist devotion to his hometown made him blind to its faults.
meanings.sent5: The chauvinist's support for the local animal shelter was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A person displaying excessive or prejudiced belief in the superiority of their own gender.
meanings.sent1: The chauvinist believed that only men could excel in leadership roles.
meanings.sent2: She encountered a chauvinist who thought women were inferior in every way.
meanings.sent3: The chauvinist's views on gender were so outdated, they seemed like a joke.
meanings.sent4: His chauvinist attitude towards women was like a heavy weight on his relationships.
meanings.sent5: The chauvinist's belief in male superiority was as solid as a brick wall.
